name: Z-Burning Rage
effect: Increase the strength of the target, then inflict Burn. Inflicts Badly Poisoned. Inflicts Wounds. Inflict the effects of Taunt for 4 rounds.
description: With provocative gestures and the help of his toxic pheromones, Salem riles up the opponents and raises their fighting spirits, though this burning rage also causes them to burn up from the inside.
